page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: Most houses in Barnham have been built in the last ten years and a few shops have been built too.The older houses stand along the main road through Barnham.These were built about 50 to 80 years ago.All the houses around the area are built with bricks and tiles. The older houses are larger with 4 or 5 bedrooms and have had to build garages.The modern houses are much smaller and have 3 to 4 bedrooms with garages.They are not spaced out so much and have smaller gardens.The area around is very scenic and is a nice place to live.Most families like their homes and could not think of a better place to live.Others would like their homes to be bigger and better,but like the environment around them. By Michelle Lunt,Marie Stevens and Jackie Fleet.
